excerpt.rendered:
The Eva Black Upholstered Bed offers a touch of elegance and sophistication to any bedroom decor. Upholstered in luxurious black velvet, this bed exudes a sense of luxury and comfort. Its sleek design features button tufting and nailhead trim, adding a stylish accent to the overall look. With its contemporary style and demi-wings, this bed provides both aesthetic appeal and practicality. Whether placed in a traditional or modern setting, the Eva Black Upholstered Bed makes a statement of refined taste and timeless beauty.

    Queen 5.5ft by 6.5ft Rs 60,000/-
